description.en:
Experience the hot and humid environment of Paraguay with this GEO mod, made specifically for the Farming Simulator 17 Platinum Edition! This mod provides localized weather, growth and economy to your Seasons gameplay. Animal feed and production are also changed to reflect the conditions in the area.
This mod requires at least version 1.2 of Seasons. It was made specifically for the Platinum DLC, but can be used on any map.
